title: Ethereum Cat Herders Meeting #71
body:
## Date and Time

Nov 09, 2021, at 15:00 UTC

## Location 

Zoom: https://us02web.zoom.us/j/84834303064?pwd=YTVDNUxvSjEzL1VTOXNoNmI1a2RlZz09

Video at YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCD9iiIwTRtLDYcEWONs2Q3A

## Agenda

New users on ECH Discord and/or contributor's introduction

### 1. Network upgrade  
- [Arrow Glacier](https://github.com/ethereum/execution-specs/blob/master/network-upgrades/mainnet-upgrades/arrow-glacier.md) - ECH [blogpost](https://medium.com/ethereum-cat-herders/ethereum-arrow-glacier-upgrade-e8d20fa4c002)
- [The Merge](https://ethereumcatherders.com/the_merge.html)


### 2. ECH updates
- [ECH website updating](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/ech-website-v2/issues)
- [ECH engineering](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/issues/245) 
- [Cat blazers](https://medium.com/ethereum-cat-herders/catblazer-chronicles-oct-21-53cf3d8b7f18)
- [EIP Insight](https://hackmd.io/@poojaranjan/EthereumImprovementProposalsInsight)
- [Peep an EIP](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL4cwHXAawZxqu0PKKyMzG_3BJV_xZTi1F)  - **Upcoming** meetings can be found on [PEEPanEIP schedule](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/projects/2)

- [Meeting notes](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1axM1KaKc-GCcoPbAnYTOhgLnxXsBVoO5XRjTN3CLnck/edit#gid=0) and action items for ECH 
  - All Core Dev meeting [125](https://github.com/ethereum/pm/pull/411)
  - Consensus meeting [75](https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-pm/pull/241) 
  - The Merge [community call 1](https://github.com/ethereum/pm/pull/413)
  - EIP Improvement Process[ meeting 43](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/EIPIP/blob/master/All%20EIPIP%20Meetings/Meeting%20043.md)

### 3. New initiatives - brainstorming
- OpenEthereum client support
- DEGEN bot & POAP on ECH Discord server
- NFT for EIP authors (Final EIPs)
 
### 4. Events & Hackathon
- [ETHDenver 2022](https://www.ethdenver.com/) (Feb 11-20)

### 5. ECH funding
- Funding via ESP, Gitcoin, CLR & Moloch

### 6. Discuss and close the ECH GitHub Issues/PRs
- [ethereum-cat-herders/PM](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/issues)
- [ethereum-cat-herders/funding](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/funding/issues)

### 7. Review of outstanding action items from previous ECH meetings
- [Meeting 70](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/blob/master/All%20Ethereum%20Cat%20Herder%20Meetings/Meeting%20070.md)

- Anything else?
#### The date for the next meeting - Nov 23, 2021.
